member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.AddDelayLiveStream(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.AddDelayLiveStreamRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to set a delay in playing the images of large live streaming events, in case of emergencies.
Note: if you are to set the delay before stream push, set it at least 5 minutes before the push. This API supports configuration only by stream.

Note: if you are to set the delay before stream push, set it at least 5 minutes before the push. This API supports configuration only by stream.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.AddLiveWatermark(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.AddLiveWatermarkRequest)
member.summary: After a watermark is added and a watermark ID is successfully returned, you need to call the [CreateLiveWatermarkRule](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/32629?from_cn_redirect=1) API to bind the watermark ID to a stream. After the number of watermarks exceeds the upper limit of 100, to add a new watermark, you must delete an old one first.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.CreateLivePullStreamTask(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a task to pull streams from video files or an external live streaming source and publish them to a specified destination URL. Notes: 1. By default, you can have at most 20 stream pulling tasks at a time. You can submit a ticket to raise the limit. 2. Only H.264 and H.265 are supported for video. If the source video is in a different format, please transcode it first. 3. Only AAC is supported for audio. If the source audio is in a different format, please transcode it first. 4. You can enable auto deletion in the console to delete expired tasks automatically. 5. The pull and relay feature is a paid feature. For its billing details, see [Relay](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/53308?from_cn_redirect=1). 6. CSS is only responsible for pulling and relaying content. Please make sure that your content is authorized and complies with relevant laws and regulations. In case of copyright infringement or violation of laws or regulations, CSS will suspend its service for you and reserves the right to seek legal remedies.

member.summary: This API is used to create a task to pull streams from video files or an external live streaming source and publish them to a specified destination URL. Notes: 1. By default, you can have at most 20 stream pulling tasks at a time. You can submit a ticket to raise the limit. 2. Only H.264 and H.265 are supported for video. If the source video is in a different format, please transcode it first. 3. Only AAC is supported for audio. If the source audio is in a different format, please transcode it first. 4. You can enable auto deletion in the console to delete expired tasks automatically. 5. The pull and relay feature is a paid feature. For its billing details, see [Relay](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/53308?from_cn_redirect=1). 6. CSS is only responsible for pulling and relaying content. Please make sure that your content is authorized and complies with relevant laws and regulations. In case of copyright infringement or violation of laws or regulations, CSS will suspend its service for you and reserves the right to seek legal remedies.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.CreateLiveRecord(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest)
member.summary:
- Prerequisites 1. Recording files are stored on the VOD platform, so if you need to use the recording feature, you must first activate the VOD service. 2. After the recording files are stored, applicable fees (including storage fees and downstream playback traffic fees) will be charged according to the VOD billing mode. For more information, please see the [corresponding document](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/2838?from_cn_redirect=1).
- Mode description This API supports two recording modes: 1. Scheduled recording mode **(default mode)**. The start time and end time need to be passed in, according to which the recording task will start and end automatically. Before the set end time expires (provided that `StopLiveRecord` is not called to terminate the task prematurely), the recording task is valid and will be started even after the push is interrupted and restarted multiple times. 2. Real-time video recording mode. The start time passed in will be ignored, and recording will be started immediately after the recording task is created. The recording duration can be up to 30 minutes. If the end time passed in is more than 30 minutes after the current time, it will be counted as 30 minutes. Real-time video recording is mainly used for recording highlight scenes, and you are recommended to keep the duration within 5 minutes.
- Precautions 1. The API call timeout period should be set to more than 3 seconds; otherwise, retries and calls by different start/end time values may result in repeated recording tasks and thus incur additional recording fees. 2. Subject to the audio and video file formats (FLV/MP4/HLS), the video codec of H.264 and audio codec of AAC are supported. 3. In order to avoid malicious or unintended frequent API requests, the maximum number of tasks that can be created in scheduled recording mode is limited: up to 4,000 tasks can be created per day (excluding deleted ones), and up to 400 ones can run concurrently. If you need a higher upper limit, please submit a ticket for application. 4. This calling method does not support recording streams outside Mainland China for the time being.

Before the set end time expires (provided that `StopLiveRecord` is not called to terminate the task prematurely), the recording task is valid and will be started even after the push is interrupted and restarted multiple times. 2. Real-time video recording mode. The start time passed in will be ignored, and recording will be started immediately after the recording task is created. The recording duration can be up to 30 minutes. If the end time passed in is more than 30 minutes after the current time, it will be counted as 30 minutes. Real-time video recording is mainly used for recording highlight scenes, and you are recommended to keep the duration within 5 minutes.
- Precautions 1. member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.CreateRecordTask(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateRecordTaskRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a recording task that starts and ends at specific times and records videos according to a specific recording template. - Prerequisites 1. Because recording files are saved in VOD, you must first activate VOD. 2. Storage and playback traffic fees are charged for storing and playing the videos recorded. For details, see [Purchase Guide](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/2837). - Notes 1. If streaming is interrupted, the current recording will stop and a recording file will be generated. When streaming resumes, as long as it’s before the end time of the task, recording will start again. 2. Avoid creating recording tasks with overlapping time periods. If there are multiple tasks with overlapping time periods for the same stream, the system will start three recording tasks at most to avoid repeated recording. 3. Task records are kept for three months by the platform. 4. Do not use the new [CreateRecordTask](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/45983?from_cn_redirect=1), [StopRecordTask](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/45981?from_cn_redirect=1), and [DeleteRecordTask] APIs together with the old `CreateLiveRecord`, `StopLiveRecord`, and `DeleteLiveRecord` APIs. 5. Do not create recording tasks and push streams at the same time. After creating a recording task, we recommend you wait at least three seconds before pushing streams.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.CreateRecordTaskSync(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateRecordTaskRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a recording task that starts and ends at specific times and records videos according to a specific recording template. - Prerequisites 1. Because recording files are saved in VOD, you must first activate VOD. 2. Storage and playback traffic fees are charged for storing and playing the videos recorded. For details, see [Purchase Guide](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/2837). - Notes 1. If streaming is interrupted, the current recording will stop and a recording file will be generated. When streaming resumes, as long as it’s before the end time of the task, recording will start again. 2. Avoid creating recording tasks with overlapping time periods. If there are multiple tasks with overlapping time periods for the same stream, the system will start three recording tasks at most to avoid repeated recording. 3. Task records are kept for three months by the platform. 4. Do not use the new [CreateRecordTask](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/45983?from_cn_redirect=1), [StopRecordTask](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/45981?from_cn_redirect=1), and [DeleteRecordTask] APIs together with the old `CreateLiveRecord`, `StopLiveRecord`, and `DeleteLiveRecord` APIs. 5. Do not create recording tasks and push streams at the same time. After creating a recording task, we recommend you wait at least three seconds before pushing streams.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.DescribeLiveDomainReferer(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveDomainRefererRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to query referer allowlist/blocklist configuration of a live streaming domain name. Referer information is included in HTTP requests. After you enable referer configuration, live streams using RTMP or WebRTC for playback will not authenticate the referer and can be played back normally. To make the referer configuration effective, the HTTP-FLV or HLS protocol is recommended for playback.

To make the referer configuration effective, the HTTP-FLV or HLS protocol is recommended for playback.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.DescribeLiveStreamOnlineList(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveStreamOnlineListRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to get the list of ongoing live streams. It queries the information of live streams after they are pushed successfully.
Notes: 1. This API is used to query the list of active live streams only, and should not be relied too much upon in important business scenarios. 2. This API can query up to 20,000 streams. To query more streams, please contact our after-sales service team.

member.summary:
This API is used to get the list of ongoing live streams. It queries the information of live streams after they are pushed successfully.
Notes: 1. This API is used to query the list of active live streams only, and should not be relied too much upon in important business scenarios. 2. This API can query up to 20,000 streams. To query more streams, please contact our after-sales service team.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.DescribeLiveStreamState(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveStreamStateRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to get the stream status, which may be active, inactive, or disabled.
Notes: This API allows you to query the status of a stream in real time. Given external factors such as network jitter, note the following when you determine whether a host is online: 1. If possible, use your own logic of stream starting/stopping in a room, such as streaming signaling on the client and the online heartbeat of a host, to determine whether the host is online. 2. If your application does not provide the room management feature, use the following methods to determine whether a host is online: 2.1 Use the [live stream callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/20388?from_cn_redirect=1). 2.2 Call [DescribeLiveStreamOnlineList](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/267/20472?from_cn_redirect=1) on a regular basis (interval > 1 min). 2.3 Call this API. 2.4 A host is considered to be online if the result returned by any of the above methods indicates so. If an API call times out or a parsing error occurs, to minimize the impact on your business, CSS will also consider the host online.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.DescribeLiveStreamStateSync(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveStreamStateRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to get the stream status, which may be active, inactive, or disabled.
Notes: This API allows you to query the status of a stream in real time. Given external factors such as network jitter, note the following when you determine whether a host is online: 1. If possible, use your own logic of stream starting/stopping in a room, such as streaming signaling on the client and the online heartbeat of a host, to determine whether the host is online. 2. If your application does not provide the room management feature, use the following methods to determine whether a host is online: 2.1 Use the [live stream callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/267/20388?from_cn_redirect=1). 2.2 Call [DescribeLiveStreamOnlineList](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/267/20472?from_cn_redirect=1) on a regular basis (interval > 1 min). 2.3 Call this API. 2.4 A host is considered to be online if the result returned by any of the above methods indicates so. If an API call times out or a parsing error occurs, to minimize the impact on your business, CSS will also consider the host online.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.DescribeLiveTranscodeTotalInfo(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveTranscodeTotalInfoRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to query transcoding usage. You can use it to query data in the past three months. Notes: If the start time and end time are on the same day, the data returned will be on a 5-minute basis. If the start time and end time are not on the same day or if the data of specified domains is queried, the data returned will be on an hourly basis.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.LiveClient.ModifyLiveDomainReferer(TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveDomainRefererRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to configure referer allowlist/blocklist of a live streaming domain name. Referer information is included in HTTP requests. After you enable referer configuration, live streams using RTMP or WebRTC for playback will not authenticate the referer and can be played back normally. To make the referer configuration effective, the HTTP-FLV or HLS protocol is recommended for playback.

To make the referer configuration effective, the HTTP-FLV or HLS protocol is recommended for playback.

member.summary: Expiration time of the configured delayed playback in UTC format, such as 2018-11-29T19:00:00Z. Notes: 1. member.summary: The domain verification type. Valid values (the value of this parameter must be the same as `VerifyType` of the `AuthenticateDomainOwner` API): dnsCheck: Check immediately whether the verification DNS record has been added successfully. If so, record this verification result. fileCheck: Check immediately whether the verification HTML file has been uploaded successfully. If so, record this verification result. dbCheck: Check whether the domain has already been verified. If you do not pass a value, `dbCheck` will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixInputParam.InputStreamName
member.summary: Input stream name, which can contain up to 80 bytes of letters, digits, and underscores. The value should be the name of an input stream for stream mix when `LayoutParams.InputType` is set to `0` (audio and video), `4` (pure audio), or `5` (pure video). The value can be a random name for identification, such as `Canvas1` or `Picture1`, when `LayoutParams.InputType` is set to `2` (image) or `3` (canvas).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixInputParam.LayoutParams
member.summary: Input stream layout parameter.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixInputParam.CropParams
member.summary: Input stream crop parameter.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.ImageLayer
member.summary: Input layer. Value range: [1,16] (1) For the background stream, i.e., the room owner’s image or the canvas, set this parameter to `1`. (2) This parameter is required for audio-only stream mixing as well. Note that two inputs cannot have the same `ImageLayer` value.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.InputType
member.summary: Input type. Value range: [0,5]. If this parameter is left empty, 0 will be used by default. 0: the input stream is audio/video. 2: the input stream is image. 3: the input stream is canvas. 4: the input stream is audio. 5: the input stream is pure video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.ImageHeight
member.summary: Output height of input video image. Value range: Pixel: [0,2000] Percentage: [0.01,0.99] If this parameter is left empty, the input stream height will be used by default. If percentage is used, the expected output is (percentage * background height).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.ImageWidth
member.summary: Output width of input video image. Value range: Pixel: [0,2000] Percentage: [0.01,0.99] If this parameter is left empty, the input stream width will be used by default. If percentage is used, the expected output is (percentage * background width).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.LocationX
member.summary: X-axis offset of input in output video image. Value range: Pixel: [0,2000] Percentage: [0.01,0.99] If this parameter is left empty, 0 will be used by default. Horizontal offset from the top-left corner of main host background video image. If percentage is used, the expected output is (percentage * background width).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.LocationY
member.summary: Y-axis offset of input in output video image. Value range: Pixel: [0,2000] Percentage: [0.01,0.99] If this parameter is left empty, 0 will be used by default. Vertical offset from the top-left corner of main host background video image. If percentage is used, the expected output is (percentage * background width)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.Color
member.summary: When `InputType` is 3 (canvas), this value indicates the canvas color. Commonly used colors include: Red: 0xcc0033. Yellow: 0xcc9900. Green: 0xcccc33. Blue: 0x99CCFF. Black: 0x000000. White: 0xFFFFFF. Gray: 0x999999

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixLayoutParams.WatermarkId
member.summary: When `InputType` is 2 (image), this value is the watermark ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputStreamName
member.summary: Output stream name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputStreamType
member.summary: Output stream type. Valid values: [0,1]. If this parameter is left empty, 0 will be used by default. If the output stream is a stream in the input stream list, enter 0. If you want the stream mix result to be a new stream, enter 1. If this value is 1, `output_stream_id` cannot appear in `input_stram_list`, and there cannot be a stream with the same ID on the LVB backend.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputStreamBitRate
member.summary: The output bitrate. Value range: 1-10000. If you do not specify this, the system will select a bitrate automatically.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputStreamGop
member.summary: Output stream GOP size. Value range: [1,10]. If this parameter is left empty, the system will automatically determine.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputStreamFrameRate
member.summary: Output stream frame rate. Value range: [1,60]. If this parameter is left empty, the system will automatically determine.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputAudioBitRate
member.summary: Output stream audio bitrate. Value range: [1,500] If this parameter is left empty, the system will automatically determine.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputAudioSampleRate
member.summary: Output stream audio sample rate. Valid values: [96000, 88200, 64000, 48000, 44100, 32000,24000, 22050, 16000, 12000, 11025, 8000]. If this parameter is left empty, the system will automatically determine.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.OutputAudioChannels
member.summary: Output stream audio sound channel. Valid values: [1,2]. If this parameter is left empty, the system will automatically determine.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CommonMixOutputParams.MixSei

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateCommonMixStreamRequest.MixStreamTemplateId
member.summary: Input template ID. If this parameter is set, the output will be generated according to the default template layout, and there is no need to enter the custom position parameters. If this parameter is left empty, 0 will be used by default. For two input sources, 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50 are supported. For three input sources, 310, 390, and 391 are supported. For four input sources, 410 is supported. For five input sources, 510 and 590 are supported. For six input sources, 610 is supported.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.SourceType
member.summary: The source type. Valid values: PullLivePushLive: Live streaming PullVodPushLive: Video files PullPicPushLive: Images

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.SourceUrls
member.summary: The source URL(s). If `SourceType` is `PullLivePushLive`, you can specify only one source URL. If `SourceType` is `PullVodPushLive`, you can specify at most 30 source URLs. Supported file formats: FLV, MP4, HLS. Supported protocols: HTTP, HTTPS, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SRT. Notes: 1. We recommend you use FLV files as the source. Poorly interleaved MP4 files may result in playback stuttering. You can also re-interleave your MP4 files before adding them as the source. 2. Do not use private network domains or malicious URLs. CSS will block accounts that do. 3. To avoid push and playback issues, make sure the source files are properly interleaved. 4. Supported video coding formats: H.264, H.265. 5. Supported audio coding format: AAC. 6. Use small video files, preferably not longer than one hour. Large files may take a long time to load or resume after pause. Relay may fail if the time consumed exceeds 15 seconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.DomainName
member.summary: The push domain name. The pulled stream is pushed to this domain. Note: If the destination is not a CSS address and its format is different from that of CSS addresses, pass the full address to `ToUrl`. For details, see the description of the `ToUrl` parameter.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.AppName
member.summary: The application to push to. The pulled stream is pushed to this application.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.StreamName
member.summary: The stream name. The pulled stream is pushed under this name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.StartTime
member.summary: The start time. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.EndTime
member.summary: The end time. Notes: 1. The end time must be later than the start time. 2. The end time and start time must be later than the current time. 3. The end time and start time must be less than seven days apart. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.Operator
member.summary: The operator.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.CallbackEvents
member.summary:
The events to listen for. If you do not pass this parameter, all events will be listened for. TaskStart: Callback for starting a task TaskExit: Callback for ending a task VodSourceFileStart: Callback for starting to pull from video files VodSourceFileFinish: Callback for stopping pulling from video files ResetTaskConfig: Callback for modifying a task
`TaskAlarm` indicates a warning event. `AlarmType` examples: PullFileUnstable: Pull from video files is unstable. PushStreamUnstable: Push is unstable. PullFileFailed: Error pulling from video files. PushStreamFailed: Push error. FileEndEarly: The video file ended prematurely.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodLoopTimes
member.summary: The number of times to loop video files. Default value: -1. -1: Loop indefinitely 0: Do not loop > 0: The number of loop times. A task will end either when the videos are looped for the specified number of times or at the specified task end time, whichever is earlier. This parameter is valid only when the source is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodRefreshType
member.summary:
The behavior after the source video files (`SourceUrls`) are changed. ImmediateNewSource: Play the new videos immediately ContinueBreakPoint: Play the new videos after the current video is finished playing (the remaining videos in the old playlist will not be played).
This parameter is valid only if the source before the change is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.CallbackUrl
member.summary: A custom callback URL. Callbacks about pull and relay events will be sent to this URL.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.ExtraCmd
member.summary: Other parameters. For example, you can use `ignore_region` to ignore the region passed in and assign a region based on load distribution.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.Comment
member.summary: The remarks for a task, not longer than 512 bytes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.ToUrl
member.summary:
The complete destination URL. If you specify this parameter, make sure you pass in an empty string for `DomainName`, `AppName`, and `StreamName`.
Note: Make sure that the expiration time of the signature is later than the task end time.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.BackupSourceType
member.summary: The backup source type. PullLivePushLive: Live streaming PullVodPushLive: Video files Notes: 1. Backup sources are supported only if the primary source type is live streaming. 2. When pull from the primary source is interrupted, the system will pull from the backup source. 3. If the backup source is a video file, each time the video is finished, the system will check if the primary source is recovered and will switch back if it is.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.BackupSourceUrl
member.summary: The URL of the backup source. You can specify only one backup source URL.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.WatermarkList
member.summary: The information of watermarks to add. Notes: 1. You can add up to four watermarks to different locations of the video. 2. Make sure you use publicly accessible URLs for the watermark images. 3. Supported image formats include PNG, JPG, and GIF.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodLocalMode
member.summary: Whether to use local mode when the source type is video files. The default is `0`. 0: Do not use local mode 1: Use local mode Note: If you enable local mode, MP4 files will be downloaded to local storage, and the local files will be used for push. This ensures more reliable push. Pushing a local file will incur additional fees.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.StreamName
member.summary: Stream name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.AppName
member.summary: Push path, which is the same as the `AppName` in push and playback addresses and is `live` by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.DomainName
member.summary: Push domain name. This parameter must be set for multi-domain name push.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.StartTime
member.summary: Recording start time, which is China standard time and should be URL-encoded (RFC3986). For example, the encoding of 2017-01-01 10:10:01 is 2017-01-01+10%3a10%3a01. In scheduled recording mode, this field must be set; in real-time video recording mode, this field is ignored.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.EndTime
member.summary: Recording end time, which is China standard time and should be URL-encoded (RFC3986). For example, the encoding of 2017-01-01 10:30:01 is 2017-01-01+10%3a30%3a01. In scheduled recording mode, this field must be set; in real-time video recording mode, this field is optional. If the recording is set to real-time video recording mode through the `Highlight` parameter, the set end time should not be more than 30 minutes after the current time. If the set end time is more than 30 minutes after the current time, earlier than the current time, or left empty, the actual end time will be 30 minutes after the current time.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.RecordType
member.summary: Recording type. "video": Audio-video recording **(default)**. "audio": audio recording. In both scheduled and real-time video recording modes, this parameter is valid and is not case sensitive.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.FileFormat
member.summary: Recording file format. Valid values: "flv" **(default)**, "hls", "mp4", "aac", "mp3". In both scheduled and real-time video recording modes, this parameter is valid and is not case sensitive.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.Highlight
member.summary: Mark for enabling real-time video recording mode. 0: Real-time video recording mode is not enabled, i.e., the scheduled recording mode is used **(default)**. See [Sample 1](#.E7.A4.BA.E4.BE.8B1-.E5.88.9B.E5.BB.BA.E5.AE.9A.E6.97.B6.E5.BD.95.E5.88.B6.E4.BB.BB.E5.8A.A1). 1: Real-time video recording mode is enabled. See [Sample 2](#.E7.A4.BA.E4.BE.8B2-.E5.88.9B.E5.BB.BA.E5.AE.9E.E6.97.B6.E5.BD.95.E5.88.B6.E4.BB.BB.E5.8A.A1).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveRecordRequest.MixStream
member.summary: Flag for enabling A+B=C mixed stream recording. 0: A+B=C mixed stream recording is not enabled **(default)**. 1: A+B=C mixed stream recording is enabled. In both scheduled and real-time video recording modes, this parameter is valid.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.TemplateName
member.summary: Template name, such as “900p”. This can be only a combination of letters and digits. Length limit: Standard transcoding: 1-10 characters Top speed codec transcoding: 3-10 characters

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.VideoBitrate
member.summary: Video bitrate in Kbps. Value range: 100-8000. Note: the transcoding template requires that the bitrate be unique. Therefore, the final saved bitrate may be different from the input bitrate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Acodec
member.summary: Audio codec. Default value: aac. Note: this parameter is unsupported now.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.AudioBitrate
member.summary: Audio bitrate. Default value: 0. Value range: 0-500.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Vcodec
member.summary:
Video codec. Valid values: h264, h265, origin (default)
origin: original codec as the output codec

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Description
member.summary: Template description.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.NeedVideo
member.summary: Whether to keep the video. 0: no; 1: yes. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Width
member.summary: Width. Default value: 0. Value range: 0-3000 It must be a multiple of 2. The original width is 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.NeedAudio
member.summary: Whether to keep the audio. 0: no; 1: yes. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Height
member.summary: Height. Default value: 0 Value range: 0-3000 The value must be a multiple of 2. The original height is `0`. This parameter is required for a top speed codec template (when `AiTransCode` is `1`).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Fps
member.summary: Frame rate. Default value: 0. Value range: 0-60

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Gop
member.summary: Keyframe interval in seconds. Default value: original interval Value range: 2-6

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Rotate
member.summary: Rotation angle. Default value: 0. Valid values: 0, 90, 180, 270

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Profile
member.summary: Encoding quality: baseline/main/high. Default value: baseline.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.BitrateToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original bitrate when the set bitrate is larger than the original bitrate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.HeightToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original height when the set height is higher than the original height. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.FpsToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original frame rate when the set frame rate is larger than the original frame rate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.AiTransCode
member.summary: Whether it is a top speed codec template. 0: no, 1: yes. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.AdaptBitratePercent
member.summary:
Bitrate compression ratio of top speed codec video. Target bitrate of top speed code = VideoBitrate * (1-AdaptBitratePercent)
Value range: 0.0-0.5.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.ShortEdgeAsHeight
member.summary: Whether to use the short side as the video height. 0: no, 1: yes. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.DRMType
member.summary: The DRM encryption type. Valid values: fairplay, normalaes, widevine. If you do not pass this parameter or pass in an empty string, the existing configuration will be reset.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.CreateLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.DRMTracks
member.summary: The tracks to encrypt. Valid values: AUDIO, SD, HD, UHD1, UHD2. You can choose only one video track (SD, HD, UHD1, or UHD2). If you do not pass this parameter or pass in an empty string, the existing configuration will be reset.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveRecordRuleRequest.DomainName
member.summary: Push domain name. Domain name+AppName+StreamName uniquely identifies a single transcoding rule. If you need to delete it, strong match is required. For example, even if AppName is blank, you need to pass in a blank string to make a strong match.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveRecordRuleRequest.AppName
member.summary: Push path, which is the same as the AppName in push and playback addresses and is "live" by default. Domain name+AppName+StreamName uniquely identifies a single transcoding rule. If you need to delete it, strong match is required. For example, even if AppName is blank, you need to pass in a blank string to make a strong match.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveRecordRuleRequest.StreamName
member.summary: Stream name. Domain name+AppName+StreamName uniquely identifies a single transcoding rule. If you need to delete it, strong match is required. For example, even if AppName is blank, you need to pass in a blank string to make a strong match.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveTimeShiftRuleRequest.DomainName
member.summary: The push domain. `Domain name+AppName+StreamName` uniquely identifies a time shifting rule. To delete a time shifting rule, exact match is required. This means if the `AppName` of a time shifting rule is empty, to delete the rule, you need to pass in an empty string for `AppName`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveTimeShiftRuleRequest.AppName
member.summary: The push path, which should be the same as `AppName` in the push and playback URLs. The default value is `live`. `Domain name+AppName+StreamName` uniquely identifies a time shifting rule. To delete a time shifting rule, exact match is required. This means if the `AppName` of a time shifting rule is empty, to delete the rule, you need to pass in an empty string for `AppName`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DeleteLiveTimeShiftRuleRequest.StreamName
member.summary: The stream name. `Domain name+AppName+StreamName` uniquely identifies a time shifting rule. To delete a time shifting rule, exact match is required. This means if the `AppName` of a time shifting rule is empty, to delete the rule, you need to pass in an empty string for `AppName`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveTimeShiftBillInfoListRequest.StartTime
member.summary:
The start time for query. You can query data from the past three months. The longest time period that can be queried is one month.
It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.DescribeLiveTimeShiftBillInfoListRequest.EndTime
member.summary:
The end time for query. You can query data from the past three months. The longest time period that can be queried is one month.
It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.summary: Push address. Its value is the same as the `AppName` in playback address. It supports exact match, and takes effect only when `StreamName` is passed at the same time. If it is left empty, the full playback data will be queried. Note: to query by `AppName`, you need to submit a ticket first. After your application succeeds, it will take about 5 business days (subject to the time in the reply) for the configuration to take effect.

member.summary: The playback domains to bind and whether to enable HTTPS for them. If neither `CloudCertId` nor the public/private key is specified, and a domain is already bound with a certificate, this API will only update the HTTPS configuration of the domain and, if the certificate is a self-owned certificate, upload it to Tencent Cloud.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveDomainCertBindingsRequest.CloudCertId
member.summary: The SSL certificate ID assigned by Tencent Cloud. For details, see https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/400/41665?from_cn_redirect=1

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveDomainCertBindingsRequest.CertificatePublicKey
member.summary: The public key of the certificate. You can specify either `CloudCertId` or the public/private key. If both are specified, the private and public key parameters will be ignored. If you pass in only the public and private keys, the corresponding certificate will be uploaded to Tencent Cloud SSL Certificate Service, which will generate a `CloudCertId` for the certificate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveDomainCertBindingsRequest.CertificatePrivateKey
member.summary: The private key of the certificate. You can specify either `CloudCertId` or the public/private key. If both are specified, the private and public key parameters will be ignored. If you pass in only the public and private keys, the corresponding certificate will be uploaded to Tencent Cloud SSL Certificate Service, which will generate a `CloudCertId` for the certificate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveDomainCertBindingsRequest.CertificateAlias
member.summary: The remarks for the certificate in Tencent Cloud SSL Certificate Service. This parameter will be ignored if `CloudCertId` is specified.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.TaskId
member.summary: The task ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.Operator
member.summary: The operator.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.SourceUrls
member.summary: The source URL(s). If `SourceType` is `PullLivePushLive`, you can specify only one source URL. If `SourceType` is `PullVodPushLive`, you can specify at most 30 source URLs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.StartTime
member.summary: The start time. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.EndTime
member.summary: The end time. Notes: 1. The end time must be later than the start time. 2. The end time and start time must be later than the current time. 3. The end time and start time must be less than seven days apart. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodLoopTimes
member.summary: The number of times to loop video files. -1: Loop indefinitely 0: Do not loop > 0: The number of loop times. A task will end either when the videos are looped for the specified number of times or at the specified task end time, whichever is earlier. This parameter is valid only if the source is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodRefreshType
member.summary: The behavior after the source video files (`SourceUrls`) are changed. ImmediateNewSource: Play the new videos immediately ContinueBreakPoint: Finish the current video first and then pull from the new source. This parameter is valid only if the source is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.Status
member.summary: Whether to enable or pause the task. Valid values: enable pause

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.CallbackEvents
member.summary: The events to listen for. If you do not pass this parameter, all events will be listened for. TaskStart: Callback for starting a task TaskExit: Callback for ending a task VodSourceFileStart: Callback for starting to pull from video files VodSourceFileFinish: Callback for stopping pulling from video files ResetTaskConfig: Callback for modifying a task

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.CallbackUrl
member.summary: A custom callback URL. Callbacks will be sent to this URL.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.FileIndex
member.summary: The index of the video to start from. The value of this parameter cannot be smaller than 1 or larger than the number of elements in `SourceUrls`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.OffsetTime
member.summary: The playback offset (seconds). Notes: 1. This parameter should be used together with `FileIndex`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.Comment
member.summary: The remarks for the task.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.BackupSourceType
member.summary: The backup source type. PullLivePushLive: Live streaming PullVodPushLive: Video files Notes: 1. Backup sources are supported only if the primary source type is live streaming. 2. Leaving this parameter empty will reset the backup source. 3. When pull from the primary source is interrupted, the system will pull from the backup source. 4. If the backup source is a video file, each time the video is finished, the system will check if the primary source is recovered and will switch back if it is.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.BackupSourceUrl
member.summary: The URL of the backup source. You can specify only one backup source URL.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.WatermarkList
member.summary: The information of watermarks to add. Notes: 1. You can add up to four watermarks to different locations of the video. 2. Make sure you use publicly accessible URLs for the watermark images. 3. Supported image formats include PNG and JPG. 4. If you change the watermark configuration of a task whose source is a list of video files, the new configuration will take effect for the next file in the list. 5. If you change the watermark configuration of a task whose source is a live stream, the new configuration will take effect immediately. 6. If you want to stop using watermarks, pass in an empty array. 7. Currently, animated watermarks are not supported.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLivePullStreamTaskRequest.VodLocalMode
member.summary: Whether to use local mode when the source type is video files. The default is `0`. 0: Do not use local mode 1: Use local mode Note: If you enable local mode, MP4 files will be downloaded to local storage, and the local files will be used for push. This ensures more reliable push. Pushing a local file will incur additional fees.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Template description.

member.summary: Video bitrate in Kbps. Value range: 100-8000. Note: the transcoding template requires that the bitrate be unique. Therefore, the final saved bitrate may be different from the input bitrate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Width
member.summary: Width in pixels. Value range: 0-3000. It must be a multiple of 2. The original width is 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.NeedVideo
member.summary: Whether to keep the video. 0: no; 1: yes. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.NeedAudio
member.summary: Whether to keep the audio. 0: no; 1: yes. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Height
member.summary: Height in pixels. Value range: 0-3000. It must be a multiple of 2. The original height is 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Fps
member.summary: Frame rate in fps. Default value: 0. Value range: 0-60

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Gop
member.summary: Keyframe interval in seconds. Value range: 2-6

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Rotate
member.summary: Rotation angle. Default value: 0. Valid values: 0, 90, 180, 270

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.Profile
member.summary: Encoding quality: baseline/main/high.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.BitrateToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original bitrate when the set bitrate is larger than the original bitrate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.HeightToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original height when the set height is higher than the original height. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.FpsToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original frame rate when the set frame rate is larger than the original frame rate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.AdaptBitratePercent
member.summary:
Bitrate compression ratio of top speed codec video. Target bitrate of top speed code = VideoBitrate * (1-AdaptBitratePercent)
Value range: 0.0-0.5.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.ShortEdgeAsHeight
member.summary: Whether to use the short side as the video height. 0: no, 1: yes. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.DRMType
member.summary: The DRM encryption type. Valid values: fairplay, normalaes, widevine. If you do not pass this parameter or pass in an empty string, the existing configuration will be reset.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.ModifyLiveTranscodeTemplateRequest.DRMTracks
member.summary: The tracks to encrypt. Valid values: AUDIO, SD, HD, UHD1, UHD2. You can choose only one video track (SD, HD, UHD1, or UHD2). If you do not pass this parameter or pass in an empty string, the existing configuration will be reset.

member.summary: The task ID.

member.summary: The source type. Valid values: PullLivePushLive: Live streaming PullVodPushLive: Video files PullPicPushLive: Images

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.SourceUrls
member.summary: The source URL(s). If `SourceType` is `PullLiveToLive`, there can be only one source URL. If `SourceType` is `PullVodToLive`, there can be at most 10 source URLs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.DomainName
member.summary: The push domain name. The pulled stream is pushed to this domain.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.AppName
member.summary: The application to push to. The pulled stream is pushed to this application.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.StreamName
member.summary: The stream name. The pulled stream is pushed under this name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.PushArgs
member.summary: The push parameter. A custom push parameter.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.StartTime
member.summary: The start time. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.EndTime
member.summary: The end time. Notes: 1. The end time must be later than the start time. 2. The end time and start time must be later than the current time. 3. The end time and start time must be less than seven days apart. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.Region
member.summary: The region where the task was created. `ap-beijing`: North China (Beijing) `ap-shanghai`: East China (Shanghai) `ap-guangzhou`: South China (Guangzhou) `ap-mumbai`: India `ap-hongkong`: Hong Kong `eu-frankfurt`: Germany `ap-seoul`: Korea `ap-bangkok`: Thailand `ap-singapore`: Singapore `na-siliconvalley`: Western US `na-ashburn`: Eastern US `ap-tokyo`: Japan

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.VodLoopTimes
member.summary: The number of times to loop video files. -1: Loop indefinitely 0: Do not loop > 0: The number of loop times. A task will end either when the videos are looped for the specified number of times or at the specified task end time, whichever is earlier. This parameter is valid only if the source is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.VodRefreshType
member.summary:
The behavior after the source video files (`SourceUrls`) are changed. ImmediateNewSource: Play the new videos immediately ContinueBreakPoint: Finish the current video first and then pull from the new source.
This parameter is valid only if the source is video files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.CreateTime
member.summary: The task creation time. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.PullStreamTaskInfo.UpdateTime
member.summary: The last updated time. It must be in UTC format. Example: 2019-01-08T10:00:00Z. Note: Beijing time is 8 hours ahead of UTC. The [ISO 8601 format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732#iso-date-format) is used.

member.summary: Max recording time per file Default value: `1800` (seconds) Value range: 30-7200 This parameter is invalid for HLS. Only one HLS file will be generated from push start to push end.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.StorageTime
member.summary: Storage duration of the recording file Value range: 0-129600000 seconds (0-1500 days) `0`: permanent

member.summary: Whether to enable recording in the current format. Default value: 0. 0: no, 1: yes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.VodSubAppId
member.summary: VOD subapplication ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.VodFileName
member.summary:
Recording filename. Supported special placeholders include: {StreamID}: stream ID {StartYear}: start time - year {StartMonth}: start time - month {StartDay}: start time - day {StartHour}: start time - hour {StartMinute}: start time - minute {StartSecond}: start time - second {StartMillisecond}: start time - millisecond {EndYear}: end time - year {EndMonth}: end time - month {EndDay}: end time - day {EndHour}: end time - hour {EndMinute}: end time - minute {EndSecond}: end time - second {EndMillisecond}: end time - millisecond
If this parameter is not set, the recording filename will be `{StreamID}_{StartYear}-{StartMonth}-{StartDay}-{StartHour}-{StartMinute}-{StartSecond}_{EndYear}-{EndMonth}-{EndDay}-{EndHour}-{EndMinute}-{EndSecond}` by default

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.Procedure
member.summary: Task flow Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.StorageMode
member.summary: Video storage class. Valid values: `normal`: STANDARD `cold`: STANDARD_IA Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.RecordParam.ClassId
member.summary: VOD subapplication category Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Vcodec
member.summary:
Codec: h264/h265/origin. Default value: h264.
origin: keep the original codec.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.VideoBitrate
member.summary: Video bitrate. Value range: 0–8,000 Kbps. If the value is 0, the original bitrate will be retained. Note: transcoding templates require a unique bitrate. The final saved bitrate may differ from the input bitrate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Acodec
member.summary: Audio codec: aac. Default value: aac. Note: This parameter will not take effect for now and will be supported soon.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.AudioBitrate
member.summary: Audio bitrate. Value range: 0–500 Kbps. 0 by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Width
member.summary: Width. Default value: 0. Value range: [0-3,000]. The value must be a multiple of 2. The original width is 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Height
member.summary: Height. Default value: 0. Value range: [0-3,000]. The value must be a multiple of 2. The original width is 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Fps
member.summary: Frame rate. Default value: 0. Range: 0-60 Fps.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Gop
member.summary: Keyframe interval, unit: second. Original interval by default Range: 2-6

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Rotate
member.summary: Rotation angle. Default value: 0. Value range: 0, 90, 180, 270

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Profile
member.summary: Encoding quality: baseline/main/high. Default value: baseline.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.BitrateToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original bitrate when the set bitrate is larger than the original bitrate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.HeightToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original height when the set height is higher than the original height. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.FpsToOrig
member.summary: Whether to use the original frame rate when the set frame rate is larger than the original frame rate. 0: no, 1: yes Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.NeedVideo
member.summary: Whether to keep the video. 0: no; 1: yes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.NeedAudio
member.summary: Whether to keep the audio. 0: no; 1: yes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.TemplateId
member.summary: Template ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.TemplateName
member.summary: Template name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.Description
member.summary: Template description.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.AiTransCode
member.summary: Whether it is a top speed codec template. 0: no, 1: yes. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.AdaptBitratePercent
member.summary:
Bitrate compression ratio of top speed code video. Target bitrate of top speed code = VideoBitrate * (1-AdaptBitratePercent)
Value range: 0.0-0.5.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.ShortEdgeAsHeight
member.summary: Whether to take the shorter side as height. 0: no, 1: yes. Default value: 0. Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.DRMType
member.summary: The DRM encryption type. Valid values: fairplay, normalaes, widevine. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Live.V20180801.Models.TemplateInfo.DRMTracks
member.summary: The tracks to encrypt. Valid values: AUDIO, SD, HD, UHD1, UHD2. Separate multiple tracks with “|”. You can choose only one video track (SD, HD, UHD1, or UHD2). Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
